entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Rigolet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:40 AM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature falling to minus 20 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Clearing late this afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 20 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 31 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow or rain. Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Windy. High plus 3. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 22. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 16. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 5. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 28. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 24. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023
